text: Hail, Mary! () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits.САЛЮТ, МАРИЯСалют, Мария! It stars Ada Rogovtseva, Angel Gutierrez, and Vitali Solomin. ==Actors== *Ada Rogovtseva as Maria Tkachyova *Angel Gutierrez as Pablo Luis Alvarez *Vitali Solomin as Seva Chudreev *Vladimir Tatosov as Ignacio Mures *Valentina Vladimirova as Maria's mother *Alexander Barinov as Pavlik == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits
title: Hail, Mary!
